name: On the Flipside
description:
It's a bit scuffed, but enjoy!

LEFT / RIGHT ARROW KEYS — Move

UP / DOWN ARROW KEYS — Look

X — Jump / Hover in the air

C — Shoot

Z — ?

A / S — View collectables

Picking up a crystal or a collectables refills HP and sets your respawn point.

Can you find every collectable?

Don't press ESC! It crashes the game.

Respawning after picking up the first crystal in the bubble area is bugged, so be careful after collecting it!

A game by Connor and Madison. Music by Christian, additional art by Liz. Special thanks to Ryan for his GOD-TIER Git knowledge; single-handedly saved this game from death-by-merge-conflict.

Made in about ~5 days for the NOKIA 3310 Jam!
